bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Specifications of High Voltage Circuit Breakers (Over 1000 Volts)
IEEE Draft Guide for Specifications of High Voltage Circuit Breakers (Over 1000 Volts)
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC37.12/D10, March 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: These specifications apply to all indoor and outdoor types of ac high-voltage circuit breakers rated above 1000 volts. This document is issued only as a guide for use in compiling specifications for ac high-voltage circuit breakers. The imperative mode of the language is illustrative of that used in specifications.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
